---
title: Drag Timeline Row
---


### Row Drag

> Use the drag handle on the left to adjust the order of rows

<code src="@src/editor-demo/editor-drag" direction="vertical" />

### Drag Related Callbacks

> A series of callback functions are triggered during the drag process, which can be used to implement custom logic

<code src="@src/editor-demo/editor-drag" direction="vertical" />

### Drag API Description

#### enableRowDrag

Whether to enable row drag functionality, default is `false`

```typescript
type enableRowDrag = boolean;
```

#### onRowDragStart

Callback when row drag starts

```typescript
type onRowDragStart = (params: { row: TimelineRow }) => void;
```

#### onRowDragEnd

Callback when row drag ends

```typescript
type onRowDragEnd = (params: { row: TimelineRow; editorData: TimelineRow[] }) => void;
```
